document_data.caption: The five ''Dragon Masks'' in possession of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
document_data.name: ''Dragon Mask''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Dragon Masks''''' were a series of five [[mask (object)|masks]] associated with the "Dragon Whisperers" and the evil goddess of [[dragon]]s, [[Tiamat]].
document_data.Description: The five masks were crafted to resemble one of the five primary varieties of [[chromatic dragon]]s, those that corresponded with Tiamat's five heads. These included the [[White Dragon Mask|White]], [[Green Dragon Mask|Green]], [[Blue Dragon Mask|Blue]], [[Black Dragon Mask|Black]], and [[Red Dragon Mask]]s.
document_data.Powers:
Each mask conferred upon its wearer a variety of magical powers, several of which involved an element associated with each of the five types of chromatic dragons. They granted protection from their given element, the ability to understand and speak the [[Draconic language]], [[darkvision]] up to a range of {{SI|60|ft}}, and reduced harm made upon them by physical attacks.

Additionally, each of the masks allowed the wearer to exert a limited form of influence over chromatic dragons.

When two or more of the masks were brought together, they joined together as the ''[[Mask of the Dragon Queen]]'', which combined their respective properties and granted them each upon the wearer. Additional pieces of the five other ''dragon masks'' could later be added as well. This valuable artifact was the essential piece needed to complete the [[ritual]] that could free Tiamat from the [[Nine Hells]].
